title: What's New: November 2016
abstract: Here's a list of the new places we've reviewed this November.
content:
A homebaker that makes one of the best chocolate biscuit puddings in town.

A food truck on Marine Drive serving up fresh off-the-grill burgers.

Liberty Plaza Food Court is the more organized and less crowded brother of the Majestic City Food Court.

Hotel Nippon reopens and brings back their famed mutton rolls and other delicacies at the KAFÉ

The Hilton's brand new multi-cuisine restaurant and buffet.

A new start-up delivering healthy meals to your doorstep.

A cute cafe-style buth kade behind Dutch Hospital that serves up some amazing rice and curry at a great price.

A cozy cafe serving breakfast all day.
A ladies' clothing store selling work wear and casual wear.
An established Colombo 5 salon with great service.

The Courage Compassion Commitment (CCC) Foundation is a not for profit organisation based in Sri Lanka and Australia to provide services in the areas of cancer and mental wellbeing

One of Colombo's seediest underground clubs.
